articles.content:

articles.title: Brandon Aiyuk pulls surprising move with 49ers
articles.description: Brandon Aiyuk has pulled a surprising move with the San Francisco 49ers. Aiyuk reported to training camp for the Niners on Tuesday, according to NFL Media’s Mike Garafolo. Brandon Aiyuk in the house for the start of the #49ers’ training camp. Where it all goes from here, we shall see. https://t.co/dSmvhJarsC — Mike Garafolo (@MikeGarafolo)...The post Brandon Aiyuk pulls surprising move with 49ers appeared first on Larry Brown Sports.

articles.title: Creating Immersive Storylines In Slots: Narrative Design
articles.description: Slot machines today are no longer the same as they were decades ago. As technology improved, possibilities opened.
